description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Feta Wrapped in Prosciutto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chicken & Feta Wrapped in Prosciutto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Crumble feta in a bowl. Add mint and season with salt and pepper. Stir until combined. Using a small sharp knife, cut a pocket into the thick side of each chicken fillet. Fill with feta mixture. Wrap a slice of prosciutto around each chicken breast and secure with kitchen string.
Traditionally, in Greek-style cooking, this dish would be made using vine leaves instead of prosciutto.

Vine leaves are not readily available, try it with silverbeet instead! Pour boiling water over silverbeet leaves and leave for 2 minutes to soften. Refresh in cold water and trim away thick centre stem. Prepare chicken as per main recipe and wrap a leaf around each piece, securing with kitchen string. Cook as per main recipe.
Place onto prepared tray and spray with olive oil. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until chicken is golden and cooked through. Serve whole or sliced.
